bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: beta3 JSON configuration backward compatibility issue
bug.description:
daanvdn @daanvdn 21:11 hi I have a MultiLayerConfiguration that I've serialized with dl4j v1.0.0-beta3. I'm now trying to deserialize it with the SNAPSHOT version of dl4j and I'm getting this error: https://gist.github.com/daanvdn/a323276f6c6e90354a254a845146ae1b#file-deserialization_error-java Could anybody suggest how I can edit the json so as to avoid this error? The json is here: https://gist.github.com/daanvdn/a323276f6c6e90354a254a845146ae1b#file-conf-json
daanvdn @daanvdn 21:57 thanks @AlexDBlack, I'm not sure I still have the exact some code, but I think this is it : https://gist.github.com/daanvdn/a323276f6c6e90354a254a845146ae1b#file-createmultilayerconfiguration-java

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
